languages.text: {n}После мгновения тишины кибергоргулья энергично кивает, вызвав новую волну боли в вашей истерзанной руке.{/n} "///Номос рады быть тебе полезным. Номос хотят помогать. Чего ты хочешь от нас?"

traits.locale_text: {n}После мгновения тишины кибергоргулья энергично кивает, вызывав новую волну боли в вашей истерзанной руке.{/n} "///Номос рады быть тебе полезным. Номос хотят помогать. Чего ты хочешь от нас?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"
languages.original_text: {n}После мгновения тишины кибергоргулья энергично кивает, вызвав новую волну боли в вашей истерзанной руке.{/n} "///Номос рады быть тебе полезным. Номос хотят помогать. Чего ты хочешь от нас?"

traits.locale_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain up your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain up your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}一瞬止まった後にサイバーガーゴイルが力強く首を振ると、すでに痛めつけられたあなたの手に新たな痛みが走った。{/n}「///ノモスはあなたのお役に立てて嬉しいです。ノモスは助けたいと思っています。我々に何をしてほしいですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬止まった後にサイバーガーゴイルが力強く首を振ると、すでに痛めつけられたあなたの手に新たな痛みが走った。{/n}「///ノモスはあなたのお役に立てて嬉しいです。ノモスは助けたいと思っています。我々に何をしてほしいですか？」
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}片刻的停顿之后，电子滴水嘴兽有力地点了点头，你饱受折磨的手又感觉到一阵疼痛。{/n}“///诺莫斯很乐意为你效劳。诺莫斯想帮忙，你想让我们做什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}片刻的停顿之后，电子滴水嘴兽有力地点了点头，你饱受折磨的手又感觉到一阵疼痛。{/n}“///诺莫斯很乐意为你效劳。诺莫斯想帮忙，你想让我们做什么？”
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause nickt der Cybergargoyle eifrig, was eine weitere Welle der Schmerzen durch deine gepeinigte Hand jagt.{/n} "///Nomos freuen sich, Euch nützlich sein zu können. Nomos wollen helfen. Was sollen wir tun?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause nickt der Cybergargoyle eifrigt, was eine weitere Welle der Schmerzen durch deine gepeinigte Hand jagt.{/n} "///Nomos freuen sich, Euch nützlich sein zu können. Nomos wollen helfen. Was sollen wir tun?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Après un instant de réflexion, la cybergargouille hoche vigoureusement la tête, ce qui provoque une nouvelle explosion de douleur dans votre main meurtrie.{/n} « ///Nous sommes contents de vous être utiles. Nous voulons aider. Que devons-nous faire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un instant de réflexion, la cybergargouille hoche vigoureusement la tête, ce qui provoque une nouvelle explosion de douleur dans votre main meurtrie.{/n} « ///Nous sommes contents de vous être utiles. Nous voulons aider. Que devons-nous faire ? »
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de un instante la cibergárgola asiente enérgicamente, haciendo que otra oleada de dolor recorra tu torturada mano.{/n} «///Nomos se alegran de ser útiles. Nomos quieren ayudar. ¿Qué quiere que hagamos?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de un instante la cibergárgola asiente enérgicamente, haciendo que otra oleada de dolor recorra tu torturada mano.{/n} «///Nomos se alegran de ser útiles. Nomos quieren ayudar. ¿Qué quiere que hagamos?».
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Bir an duraksayan sibergargoyl, hevesle başını sallayarak zavallı elini yeniden acıyla sızlatıyor.{/n} "///Nomos size hizmet edebileceği için mutlu. Nomos, yardım etmek istiyor. Ne yapmamızı istiyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a moment's pause, the cybergargoyle nods vigorously, sending another wave of pain through your tortured hand.{/n} "///Nomos are glad to be of use to you. Nomos want to help. What do you want us to do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir an duraksayan sibergargoyl, hevesle başını sallayarak zavallı elini yeniden acıyla sızlatıyor.{/n} "///Nomos size hizmet edebileceği için mutlu. Nomos yardım etmek istiyor. Ne yapmamızı istiyorsunuz?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual
